fulltext:
HIEU HA
The Logisticians.
The Adventurer.
The Partner.
Jun.2016 - Present
Senior Digital Marketing Specialist
Atoz Travel
- Lead the marketing, tracking and sales conversion of our WordPress
hosting product
- Understand and evaluate current user experience (Ux) and product
purchase patterns and work-flows
- Provide analysis and recommendations based on UX research to gain
new clients
- Identify and implement strategies for multi-channel placement and
positioning including online and partnerships
- Utilize conversion rate and funnel optimization tactics and strategies
- Align product marketing tactics, programs and projects with defined
business goals
- Assist in the creation and ownership of the marketing plans,
maintain appropriate marketing calendars and ensure timely
execution of programs and projects.
- Collaborate cross-functionally to develop and execute campaigns
across multiple channels.
- Analyze and report and make recommendations on product and
program performance and trends.
Dec.2014 - Jun.2016
SEO & Online Marketing
OK1DOLA
- Implement and interpret conversion rate tracking and optimization
- Write copy and create images for websites,CTA banners, and more
- Provide ongoing support for all sEo initiatives including reporting.
analysis,and optimization recommendations
- Optimize web pages and ad copy for search engine marketing to drive
greater user engagement and conversions
- Perform ongoing keyword research, selection and optimization for
websites, pay-per-click campaigns and remarketing
- Analyze websites, identify sEO opportunities for improvement,
recommend and implement solutions
- Research and analyze competitor websites and sEo strategies
- Recommend changes to website architecture, content, linking and
other factors to improve sEo positions for target keywords
- Compile multiple data sources and make insightful business decisions
May.2013 - Dec.2014
SEO & Online Marketing
G-OFFICE
- Implement and interpret conversion rate tracking and optimization
- Provide ongoing support for all sEo initiatives including reporting, analysis,
and optimization recommendations
- Perform ongoing keyword research, selection and optimization for websites,
pay-per-click campaigns and remarketing
- Analyze websites, identify sEO opportunities for improvement, recommend
and implement solutions
- Set-up and connect Google Analytics, Search Console, AdWords, Merchant
Center, and other digital marketing tools
- Set up GA goals and tracking, dashboards, reports
- Research and analyze competitor websites and sEO strategies
- Build a strong Internal and External Link Structure through link-building
techniques
PERSONAL SKILLS
PROFESSIONAL SKILLS
COMMUNICATION
85%
MEDIA PERFORMANCE
TEAM WORK
80%
CONTENT DEVELOPMENT
PROJECT MANAGEMENT
LEADERSHIP
95%
PHOTOSHOP
MANAGEMENT
85%
WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT
EDUCATION BACKGROUND
1. ISPACE College 2009 - 2013
2. Digital Marketing
BMG International Education 2014
REFERENCES
Available upon request .

- Analyze and report and make recommendations on product and program performance and trends.
